extendedInfo.description: Bellman act as a time announcer on your Android phone. It helps you keep time with your ears but not eyes. you can shake your phone, or, double-click Play button of headset, at any time to get time in voice report; It also chime hourly, half-hourly or quarterly for you; and unlimited alarms with various music ringtone and speaking time voice have you to be prompted at any specified time. You can select any music file storaged in SD card by your own to serve as ringtone or chime music.  Features:1. During screen turning off, shake the phone along with horizontal to speak time in voice.Note:  a. The detect shaking service may consume more power.    b. For some devices, especially equip with Android OS version 2.01 and 2.1, the detect shaking service may not work in standby or screen off status because acceleration sensor is disabled in that status.   c. For some devices whose accelerometer sensor is specified only for UI auto-rotate by the manufacturer, for example Samsung GT-S5830, the detect shaking service can not work when screen is turned off. 2. If you are used to wearing headset, now you can get time easily via double-click Play button. Note: Official google Music player should be installed, otherwise playing music couldn't be controlled via headset unless "Speak time on headset" is disabled.3. Chimes hourly, half-hourly or quarterly with options of voice, bell, prelude as well as volume. The prelude may be selected from any music file(such as mp3, wav, mid, ogg, m4a and so on) storaged on SD card.  4. Alarm clock featured with unlimited alarms, countdown starting, music ringtone, speaking time voice, various repeat cycle included custom-built in any seconds, minutes, hours and days. The ringtone may be selected from any music file(such as mp3, wav, mid, ogg, m4a and so on) storaged on SD card.5. Begin from version 3.0, the voice system is opened to users to customize themselves own voice style. So, in addition to built-in supported languages such as Czech, German, English, Spanish, French, Italian, Russian and Chinese, the app supports any other languages via customizing. How to customize your own voice style? Please visit this page (http://en.cyberhorse-workshop.com/customizevoice.htm) to see more details.6. Available voice languages: Chinese, Czech, English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Russian.

reviews.comment: Thanks for fixing the samsung audio glitching issue, so far I havent heard the music stammer yet  :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good time announcer.
reviews.comment: I like it when the female voice announces the time after the bell. It\'s a good combination of bell & voice.
reviews.author: Rafael Serrano

reviews.title: Love this.
reviews.comment: This app remind me to drink plenty of water every hour. I was too busy in the office amd dodnt drink kich water, but now not anymore.
reviews.author: Lim Wang Yeou

reviews.title: The best clock, but needs some improvement.
reviews.comment: I tried a lot of different alarm clocks. At last, I was able to find the application that does almost what I want: 1) Multiple alarm that plays my mp3 files by the number of times, not only by the number of minutes; 2) Customizable chime 3) Individual volume for different alarms. ----  A few things I don\'t like: 1). The alarms appear in the way they are entered and cannot be sorted. So if I enter a 1:00PM alarm and then 9:00AM alarm, my morning alarm will be under my evening alarm. This is not very convenient for people who change/add multiple alarms often. I would prefer if they are sorted by the order they are going to be activated or by name.  2). The interface is not consistent. Some parts of the program use black and white interface, some are colored. I personally prefer black and white. 3). If I set the alarm with the display disabled, there is no way for me to stop it. This could be a problem with long alarms. I think you should change so that display appears when the alarm sounds and disappears when the alarm is finished. 4). Shake never worked for me, but I don\'t think I need it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update causing podcast problems.
reviews.comment: Last 2 updates have made all podcasts stop playing after 2 seconds. Uninstalled Bellman and podcasts play back is fine again. Used to work great. HTC Rezound ICS Update: just switched to the Galaxy Nexus & tried Bellman again - the above mentioned problem still remains - Bellman still breaks podcast playback!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: UI Average, Generally Good, Don\'t like Volume Mech
reviews.comment: Quite Good, UI could be improved and you should be able to name and TEST items (for example volumes/tones), but lots of options. Speech is bit average.  Have not noticed it effecting battery except sometimes doesn\'t release its wakelock.  The app adjusts the volume of all other apps when chiming, it doesn\'t need to do that (and Caynax Hourly Chime doesn\'t, I\'m using it now)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: chime with spoken time & alarm
reviews.comment: Changed my phone to Samsung Galaxy S2  Quite complete in that the above options are included together with the option for prelude; only gripe: take up 4.73MB of my internal storage, would have like very much to keep this on another phone, but couldn\'t because of memory constraint. Might have been better if chime with spoken time is kept separately from alarm (likely to take up less memory), haven\'t try the shake option, so unable to comment.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app. A must.
reviews.comment: This app is great. Help all day all week. No need to keep checking phone. Awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No good with ICS
reviews.comment: Music and radio on Sam Gal Note kept cutting out on starting when double press on earphones engaged. Wish it would work with ICS update as it is a cool concept

reviews.title: Sounds are awful
reviews.comment: There are some trumpet sounds you\'ll recognize from cavalry movies, and two church bells. Nothing discrete, nothing pleasant to listen to.

reviews.title: Really kind of mucked up my phone...
reviews.comment: Keeps turning on off your media volume, really annoying...

reviews.title: Galaxy s3 user
reviews.comment: BUGGY! ... Music tracks in stock music player stop playing after 1- 2 seconds, uninstalled Bellman and music tracks play perfectly again. Could be a great app. Please fix this.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Very useful application, which can announce time after defined interval. HTC incredible S.

reviews.title: Great Appln.Love it and the chimes
reviews.comment: They keep me alert

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love it

reviews.title: I only had three different timing chimes set
reviews.comment: It takes up more than 4 mb of internal memory; also noticed that there has been no updates since Apr 2012, that\'s more than a year of no updates; need a time announcer that doesn\'t occupies more than a couple of mb
